messages.subject: Re: Spelling tests
messages.msgSnippet: ... When my son Shawn was 12 he also wanted to do spelling like this.  He had set up a whole program of self-study.  Writing the sentences also helped him with
messages.messageBody:
> but that they
> would like to write a sentence using each word. I'm torn between wondering
> if
>

When my son Shawn was 12 he also wanted to do spelling like this. He had set
up a whole program of self-study. Writing the sentences also helped him with
writing skills. I think the "testing" died out pretty quickly, but the
writing of the sentences went on for quite a while, and kept him happy -
since he was considering going to school then. He wanted the whole social
scene, but also was feeling like he needed to master more skills academically.

Connie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
